title: Green Gram Dal | Pesara Pappu Kura | Side Dish
content:
A wonderful dal recipe with Green Gram / Pesara Pappu / Mung Beans with spices, onion & tomatoes. It's so healthy and delicious side dish with roti/ Chapathi/ Plain piping hot white rice 🍚 Health Benefits of Green Gram:
  • It can help to reduce high cholesterol levels 
  • It contains antioxidants that fights with cancer development 
  • It can help to lower high blood pressure 
  • It is rich in nutrients such as magnesium, manganese , potassium, folate, copper, zinc
  • Vitamins : B1, B6, C & K
  • High in protein and dietary fiber 
Today, I prepared South Indian style dal variety with beautiful mung beans, I hope you like it Let's start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Green Gram / Pesearapappu - 120 gms - wash & soak 15 mins
  • Onion -  1 medium - 1 cup - diced
  • Tomatoes - 2 medium - finely chopped
  • Red chilly powder - 1 tsp
  • Turmeric powder - 1/2 tsp
  • Salt - 2 tsp
  • Coriander powder - 1 tsp
  • Green chillies - 2 - chopped
  • Mustard seeds - 1/2 tsp
  • Cumin seeds - 1 tsp
  • Curry leaves - 8
  • Garlic cloves - peeled off - chopped
  • Oil - 1 tb sp
Procedure: Pre-preparation:
  • Wash green gram twice under running water
  • Soak them in a bowl for 15 mins
  • Add them in pressure cooker with 1/2 tsp salt, 400 ml water & 1/4 tsp turmeric powder
  • Let it cook over medium heat and turnoff heat after 3 whistles
  • Let the pressure goes off...Open lid and keep it aside
Process of making Green Gram dal:
  • Heat sauce pan over medium heat
  • Add oil, mustard seeds, cumin seeds, curry leaves and garlic
  • Saute a minute and add chopped onion, green chillies
  • Saute 3 mins and add tomatoes
  • Mix well & cover with lid.. Cook 5 mins and add salt, red chilly powder, coriander powder and turmeric powder
  • Mix well and cover with lid for 2 mins
  • Mix well and add cooked green gram along with tamarind extract and 500 ml water
  • Mix well and cook on low to medium heat for 5 mins
  • Turn off heat and serve with roti / rice 🍚
  • Happy Cooking and have a happy day 🙂
Step by step process shown below with pictures: Note:
  • You can use any lentils instead of green gram
  • I used canola oil, you can use any cooking oil like sunflower oil/ vegetable oil
